objects.description: [Duqu](https://collaborate.mitre.org/attackics/index.php/Software/S0014)'s purpose is to 'gather intelligence data and assets from entities such as industrial infrastructure and system manufacturers, amongst others not in the industrial sector, in order to more easily conduct a future attack against another third party.'(Citation: Symantec W.32 Duqu)

external_references.description: Symantec. (n.d.). W32.Duqu The precursor to the next Stuxnet. Retrieved November 3, 2019.
